mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tpl_mv_tmdb_info_t ( tmdb_id, LANGUAGE, title, resource_data, release_date, production_countries, genres, include_adult, media_type ) VALUES ( #{tmdbId}, #{language}, #{title}, #{resourceData}, #{releaseDate}, #{regions}, #{genres}, #{adult}, #{mediaType} );

insert into tpl_mv_resource_t (resource_id, resource_name, resource_path, media_type, refresh_id, resource_info, setting_id) values (#{fileId}, #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{fileType}, #{refreshId}, #{fileInfo}, #{settingId})
mapper.select: select resource_name as fileName, resource_id as fileId, media_type as fileType, tmdb_id as tmdbId from tpl_mv_resource_t where tmdb_id is null and refresh_id != #{refreshId} LIMIT 1,20
